user_agent.description: string, required, the name of your application or your email address so we can get in touch in case you're doing something wrong.

workspace_id.description: integer, required. The workspace which data you want to access.

since.description: string, ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD), by default until - 6 days.

until.description: string, ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD), by default today

client_ids.description: client ids separated by a comma, 0 if you want to filter out time entries without a client

project_ids.description: project ids separated by a comma, 0 if you want to filter out time entries without a project

user_ids.description: user ids separated by a comma

tag_ids.description: tag ids separated by a comma, 0 if you want to filter out time entries without a tag

task_ids.description: task ids separated by a comma, 0 if you want to filter out time entries without a task

time_entry_ids.description: time entry ids separated by a comma

order_desc.description: on/off, on for descending and off for ascending order

rounding.description: on/off, default off, rounds time according to workspace settings

display_hours.description: decimal/minutes, display hours with minutes or as a decimal number, default minutes

grouping.description: users/projects, default projects. If one grouping is selected, the other acts as subgrouping.

user_agent.description: string, required, the name of your application or your email address so we can get in touch in case you're doing something wrong.

workspace_id.description: integer, required. The workspace which data you want to access.

since.description: string, ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD), by default until - 6 days.

until.description: string, ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD), by default today

client_ids.description: client ids separated by a comma, 0 if you want to filter out time entries without a client

project_ids.description: project ids separated by a comma, 0 if you want to filter out time entries without a project

tag_ids.description: tag ids separated by a comma, 0 if you want to filter out time entries without a tag

time_entry_ids.description: time entry ids separated by a comma

order_desc.description: on/off, on for descending and off for ascending order

rounding.description: on/off, default off, rounds time according to workspace settings

display_hours.description: decimal/minutes, display hours with minutes or as a decimal number, default minutes

grouping.description: users/projects/clients, default projects. If one grouping is selected, the other acts as subgrouping.

subgrouping.description: Following subgroupings are available in the summary report: projects (time_entries, tasks, users), clients (time_entries, tasks, projects, users), users (time_entries, tasks, projects, clients)

subgrouping_ids.description: Whether returned items will contain 'ids' key containing comma separated group item ID values.

grouped_time_entry_ids.description: Whether returned items will contain 'time_entry_ids' key containing comma separated time entries ID values for given item.
